resources.string: Do you have any doubt? Get in touch with us at info@barfalso.com!

Mistela is the new bar in Nou Benicalap – Torrefiel. We want it to be your bar, one of those that no longer exist. The best lunches in the neighborhood, dishes of the day, spoon dishes and even an after-dinner drink. From now on, Mistela is yours and we want you to enjoy everything we offer you, also on the terrace. Bar Mistela was born with a neighborhood soul. We have taken care of the interior, the menus and many more details, but make no mistake: you are entering a bar, one of the usual ones, and one of the cool ones. One of those you know you\'ll come back to.
